xyz.morphia

Class MapReduceOptions<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • xyz.morphia.MapReduceOptions<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of the output

    public class MapReduceOptions<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    This defines options that can be applied to a mapreduce job
    Since:
    1.3
